It's amazing how critical people have been towards this movie.  It's basically the best Sci-fi movie in years and so many people are slamming it.  

Just so no one else is disappointed with this movie, keep these things in mind:

-it will not add 3 inches to your dick
-it will not grant you immortality
-it will not make you a millionaire
-it will not cure male pattern baldness

It is just a movie.  It's a damned exciting and damned interesting sci-fi movie with aliens in it.  It's not a perfect movie.  It has some minor flaws.  But the incredible things it does far outweigh the flaws.  For instance it WILL take you to an alien world and immerse you in it...

So stop whining and lighten the hell up.  Enjoy the movie.  It was made for "entertainment", not to solve your life's problems.

SYNC FIX... those of you who don't know how to sync audio with VLC yet? it's about time to learn, I have to do this with EVERY movie I download. Press the letter K to bring the audio forward, and L to delay it. keep pressing K or L until it is synced, (5 seconds of work) this is something everyone who uses VLC (best free video player) should know. For all those people out there saying that Prometheus is prequel to alien… your all wrong, it’s not so stop all you’re crying. -- Spaihts wrote a script for a prequel to the events of the Alien films, but Scott opted for a different direction to avoid repeating cues from those films. In late 2010, Lindelof joined the project to rewrite Spaihts's script, and he and Scott developed a story that precedes the story of Alien but is not directly connected to that franchise. According to Scott, although the film shares "strands of Alien's DNA, so to speak", and takes place in the same universe, Prometheus explores its own mythology and ideas.
And to all those people that say its crap, you clearly don’t know what you’re talking about its like the best movie ever.

Prometheus may not have the same characters as Alien, but the events in Prometheus do take place before the events in Alien, and they do directly explain most of the biggest mysteries in Alien.

I don't know, but that kinda sounds like "prequel" to me...

Here's another way of saying it:  Prometheus isn't a prequel for the human characters in Alien.  It is a prequel for the alien in Alien...

And yes the scene where the dude hugs the alien cobra thing is fucking stupid.  That sequence is stupid. It's still interesting, but the human characters act unrealistic and the dialogue is stupid.

But the rest of the movie if FUCKING AWESOME, and I LOVED IT, and I can't wait for the HD rip to come out (or a great quality DVD rip, because this copy is a not great quality for a DVD rip --yeah, everyone saying it's a 10/10 must be watching it on their fucking iPhones!)

Anyway, love to EZ and all ya'll foul-mouthed muha-fuhas.... ;)

It IS a prequal. 

*SPOILERS MAY BE BELOW*

1. Wayland Industries is the same "company" with the same logo "(W)Building better worlds" which plays a huge part in Alien, Aliens, Alien 3, Alien 4, AvP(pc), AvP2(pc), AvP3(pc) and Colonial Marines(pc)

2. The synthetic known as "David" is a direct early replica of the other synthetics which also play big roles in the Alien franchise such as "Bishop"

3. LV-223 is one of the planets in the system which contains the biological mutating weapon of Xenomorphs. Alien and Aliens take part on the neighbor planet of LV-426 in the same solar system.

4. The very distinct race Xenomorph is one which biologically adapts and steals fragments of its hosts DNA which is CLEARLY seen in the movie. So although it may not directly look as the known "Alien" you can clearly see the resemblance. 

5. The "Engineer" ship(s) is the exact same model in which the Xenomorphs first build their hive in Alien and Aliens

6. Finally, the last stage of the evolutionary xenomorph which we see in this movie is CLEARLY a Alien (Xenomorph). If you cannot see the resemblance then you are blind and need glasses. The mutation, the parasite, facehugger and chestburster stages are ALL seen in the movie. 

If you had seen the other Alien movies, you would clearly know that this is a prequel. It is very obvious.
